packages.name: brave-browser
packages.install_command: sudo curl -fsSLo /usr/share/keyrings/brave-browser-archive-keyring.gpg https://brave-browser-apt-release.s3.brave.com/brave-browser-archive-keyring.gpg && echo "deb [signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/brave-browser-archive-keyring.gpg arch=amd64] https://brave-browser-apt-release.s3.brave.com/ stable main" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/brave-browser-release.list && sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y brave-browser

packages.name: protonvpn
packages.install_command: wget -qO - https://repo.protonvpn.net/debian/dists/stable/main/binary-all/protonvpn-stable-release_1.0.3-3_all.deb -O /tmp/protonvpn-release.deb && sudo dpkg -i /tmp/protonvpn-release.deb && sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y protonvpn

packages.name: proton-authenticator
packages.description: ProtonAuthenticator - Application d'authentification à deux facteurs

packages.name: proton-pass
packages.description: ProtonPass - Gestionnaire de mots de passe

packages.name: ferdium
packages.install_command: LATEST_URL=$(curl -s https://api.github.com/repos/ferdium/ferdium-app/releases/latest | grep 'browser_download_url.*AppImage' | grep 'linux-x64' | cut -d '"' -f 4) && wget -q "$LATEST_URL" -O /tmp/ferdium.AppImage && chmod +x /tmp/ferdium.AppImage && sudo mv /tmp/ferdium.AppImage /usr/local/bin/ferdium || mv /tmp/ferdium.AppImage $HOME/.local/bin/ferdium

packages.name: superproductivity
packages.install_command: LATEST_URL=$(curl -s https://api.github.com/repos/johannesjo/super-productivity/releases/latest | grep 'browser_download_url.*AppImage' | grep 'linux-x86_64' | cut -d '"' -f 4) && wget -q "$LATEST_URL" -O /tmp/superproductivity.AppImage && chmod +x /tmp/superproductivity.AppImage && sudo mv /tmp/superproductivity.AppImage /usr/local/bin/superproductivity || mv /tmp/superproductivity.AppImage $HOME/.local/bin/superproductivity

packages.name: git
packages.description: Système de contrôle de version distribué

packages.name: qt6
packages.install_command: QT_VERSION=$(curl -s https://download.qt.io/official_releases/qt/ | grep -oP 'href=\"\K[0-9]+\\.[0-9]+\\.[0-9]+' | sort -V | tail -1) && QT_MAJOR=$(echo $QT_VERSION | cut -d. -f1) && QT_MINOR=$(echo $QT_VERSION | cut -d. -f2) && INSTALLER_URL=\"https://download.qt.io/official_releases/qt/$QT_MAJOR.$QT_MINOR/$QT_VERSION/single/qt-opensource-linux-x64-$QT_VERSION.run\" && echo \"Téléchargement de Qt $QT_VERSION offline installer...\" && wget --progress=bar:force:noscroll \"$INSTALLER_URL\" -O /tmp/qt-opensource-linux-x64-$QT_VERSION.run && chmod +x /tmp/qt-opensource-linux-x64-$QT_VERSION.run && echo \"✓ Qt 6 offline installer téléchargé: /tmp/qt-opensource-linux-x64-$QT_VERSION.run\" && echo \"Pour installer, exécutez: /tmp/qt-opensource-linux-x64-$QT_VERSION.run\"

packages.name: cursor
packages.description: Cursor AI - Éditeur de code IA

packages.name: dbeaver-ce
packages.description: DBeaver - Client de base de données universel

packages.name: obs-studio
packages.description: Logiciel de streaming et d'enregistrement vidéo

packages.name: figma-linux
packages.install_command: LATEST_URL=$(curl -s https://api.github.com/repos/Figma-Linux/figma-linux/releases/latest | grep 'browser_download_url.*amd64.deb' | cut -d '"' -f 4) && wget -q "$LATEST_URL" -O /tmp/figma-linux.deb && sudo dpkg -i /tmp/figma-linux.deb || sudo apt-get install -f -y

packages.name: sublime-text
packages.install_command: wget -qO - https://download.sublimetext.com/sublimehq-pub.gpg | sudo apt-key add - && echo 'deb https://download.sublimetext.com/ apt/stable/' | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/sublime-text.list && sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y sublime-text

packages.name: streamdeck-ui
packages.description: Elgato Stream Deck - Interface de contrôle pour Linux

packages.name: piper
packages.description: Configuration des souris gaming (support Roccat et autres)
packages.install_command: sudo add-apt-repository -y ppa:libratbag-piper/piper-libratbag-git && sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y piper

packages.name: roccat-tools
packages.description: Outils de configuration pour périphériques Roccat
packages.install_command: flatpak remote-add --if-not-exists flathub https://flathub.org/repo/flathub.flatpakrepo && flatpak install -y flathub net.sourceforge.roccat.roccat-tools

packages.name: pulseaudio
packages.description: Serveur audio PulseAudio (utile pour périphériques Turtle Beach et autres casques)

packages.name: pavucontrol
packages.description: Contrôleur audio PulseAudio (configuration des périphériques audio)

packages.name: antimicro
packages.description: Mappage de manettes et périphériques de jeu (compatible Azeron, Victrix)
packages.install_command: sudo add-apt-repository -y ppa:ryochan7/antimicro && sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y antimicro

packages.name: joystick
packages.description: Outils de test et configuration pour manettes de jeu

packages.name: xone
packages.description: Pilote Linux pour Xbox One/Series X|S (support Victrix)
packages.install_command: sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y dkms curl cabextract && cd /tmp && git clone https://github.com/medusalix/xone.git && cd xone && sudo ./install.sh --release && sudo xone-get-firmware.sh && cd -

packages.name: xpadneo
packages.description: Pilote avancé pour Xbox One S (Bluetooth) et Xbox Wireless Controller
packages.install_command: sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y dkms linux-headers-$(uname -r) && cd /tmp && git clone https://github.com/atar-axis/xpadneo.git && cd xpadneo && sudo ./install.sh && cd -

packages.name: sc-controller
packages.description: Configuration avancée de manettes (alternative avec support étendu)

packages.name: nvidia-drivers
packages.description: Drivers NVIDIA (détection automatique et installation de la version recommandée)
packages.install_command: if lspci | grep -i nvidia > /dev/null; then sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y ubuntu-drivers-common && sudo ubuntu-drivers install; else echo 'Aucune carte graphique NVIDIA détectée, installation ignorée'; fi

packages.name: edrawmind
packages.install_command: DOWNLOAD_URL=$(curl -fsSL https://www.edrawmind.com/download-desktop.html | grep -oP 'https://[^"']*edrawmind[^"']*\.deb' | head -n1); if [ -z "$DOWNLOAD_URL" ]; then echo 'Impossible de trouver le lien de téléchargement EdrawMind'; exit 1; fi; echo "Téléchargement d'EdrawMind depuis $DOWNLOAD_URL"; wget -q "$DOWNLOAD_URL" -O /tmp/edrawmind_latest.deb && sudo dpkg -i /tmp/edrawmind_latest.deb || sudo apt-get install -f -y
